description: SchemaExporter is the Schema for the schemaexporters API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: SchemaExporterSpec defines the desired state of SchemaExporter

configs.description: configs is a map of string key and value pairs. It specifies additional configurations for the schema exporter. More info: https://docs.confluent.io/platform/current/schema-registry/schema-linking-cp.html#create-a-configuration-file-for-the-exporter

contextName.description: contextName specifies the custom context name in the destination Schema Registry cluster where the schemas will be exported. If this is defined, contextType will be ignored. If this is not defined, schemas will be exported to context in destination based on contextType.

contextType.description: contextType specifies the type of context created in the destination Schema Registry cluster of the schema exporter. Valid options are `Auto` and `None`. The default value is `Auto`.

destination.description: schemaRegistryCluster references the schemaRegistry cluster If this is not defined, source schemaRegistryCluster is chosen as the destination and the schema exporter will be exporting schemas within (local schemaExporter mode)

name.description: Name is the name of the referenced CR

namespace.description: Namespace of the CR. Defaults to the current namespace of the CR making the reference

schemaExporterAction.description: schemaExporterAction describes the type of action on the running schemaExporter Valid options are `Pause`, `Reset` and `Resume`.

name.description: Name is the name of the referenced CR

namespace.description: Namespace of the CR. Defaults to the current namespace of the CR making the reference

subjectRenameFormat.description: subjectRenameFormat specifies to rename format for the subjects exported to the destination. For example, if the value is `my-${subject}`, subjects at destination will become `my-firstSubject` where `firstSubject` is the original subject name.

subjects.description: subjects specifies the list of subjects to be exported by schema exporter. The default value is `["*"]`. This indicates all subjects in the default context.

status.description: SchemaExporterStatus defines the observed state of SchemaExporter

conditions.description: conditions specify the latest available observations of the current state.

items.description: Condition represents the latest available observations of the current state.

lastTransitionTime.description: lastTransitionTime shows the last time the condition was transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: lastUpdateTime shows the last time the condition was evaluated.

message.description: message shows a human-readable message with details about the transition.

reason.description: reason shows the reason for the last transition of the condition.

status.description: status shows the status of the condition, one of `True`, `False`, or `Unknown`.

contextName.description: contextName shows the name of the context in the destination Schema Registry cluster where the schemas will be exported.

contextType.description: contextType is the contextType of the schema exporter.

exporterStatus.description: exporterStatus is the status of the schema exporter.

observedGeneration.description: observedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this app.

phase.description: phase describes the state of the Application resource.

provisionToSchemaRegistryCluster.description: provisionToSchemaRegistryCluster references schemaRegistry cluster where schemaExporter is attach.

state.description: state is the state of the application

subjects.description: subjects is the list of subjects exported by the schema exporter.
